head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SANDS, HARRY, PH. D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SANDS, HARRY, PH. D.

block.p: SANDS--Harry, Ph. D. The members of the New York State Psychological Association are saddened by the death of our respected and beloved colleague and Past President (1985-1986), Harry Sands. Harry was an acclaimed psychologist, winner of APA's Gold Medal for Lifetime Achievement, and a friend and counselor to the world. He first joined NYSPA in 1952. Our condolences to Harry's loving wife, Helene, and his family.

Harry was an acclaimed psychologist, winner of APA's Gold Medal for Lifetime Achievement, and a friend and counselor to the world. He first joined NYSPA in 1952.
